info.name: Phile-web article width changer (2022-)
info.description:
Phile-webの記事の幅固定を解除します。
This script enables the fixed width of articles to be adjusted accordingly to the browser size.

I don't know how to change my original post, so I put it here.
https://uso.kkx.one/style/135543
